steps.name: When FireBase_the user receives the findings response
Then FireBase_the status code returned should be 200 for successful findings retrieval
And FireBase_the response should contain null "chatbot_id" and "chatbot_name"
And FireBase_the "scan_id" in response should match "3412a2c5-127b-476c-b399-af68ee4aef00"
And FireBase_the response should contain an empty list of findings
